George P: Bush's claim of being a "retired U.S. Navy officer" was found to be False by PolitiFact Texas.
Jerry Patterson: Bush's opponent in the Republican primary, questioned the claim, stating that it takes 20 years to retire from the armed forces and that Bush had not served for that long.
It was confirmed that Bush was a Navy Re: commissioned on May 21, 2007, and left the Navy Reserve as a lieutenant on May 9, 2017.
Bush: s campaign spokesman provided documents and photos, including a letter congratulating Bush on his selection as an intelligence officer and a certificate showing his honorable discharge as a lieutenant on May 9, 2017.
